alert.note: Alert for Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 2:13PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern El Paso County through 245 PM MDT... At 212 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Peyton, or 26 miles northeast of Colorado Springs, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Calhan and Peyton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft
